0010010011111010 1100011010000110 1 -> sum: 1110101110000001, cout: 0
1110000000001110 0011000101000010 1 -> sum: 0001000101010001, cout: 1
1010010101010101 0001101001100110 1 -> sum: 1011111110111100, cout: 0
